summary: Changes Farkas into Hulkas. Thats all.
descriptionHtml:
Update:

Version 2.0
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now the Hulkas have incredible Power. He smash like an Giant and is fast like an Werewolf.
He Breath like an Giant and have their Voice to. 
He doesnt need Weapons anymore, he is the Weapon.
Have Fun by watching flying Enemys ^^

1.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changes Farkas into Hulkas. Thats all. 
--> He fight with his Fists but when he see a Weapon he will take it-
-Powerless
-Uses Weapons

Knowing Bugs: 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I could be that he doesnt want to follow you. There is an Problem with the Dialog Option.
So you have to take him as an Companion befor you load the Mod. This issue is of the GiantVoice. 


Installation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just Put the ESP and BSA Files in your Skyrim Data Folder and enable it with the Manager.

Deinstallation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Erase the Hulkas files from your Skyrim Data Folder.
author: LordDenethor
